788230.name: FeArea - Universal Soldier Founder's Pack
788230.description:
This pack includes:

  • additional 7 days of premium account that boosts exp and token gain
  • 3000 more tokens of each class to upgrade your units
  • 30 more gold tokens to spend them the way you like
  • Pack of "Speed of Light" skins - 3 unique skins for each in-game unit that aren't available for in-game purchase
  • Absolutely free access to a new unit a week before it will become available for purchase. SKAT - a new vehicle that is currently under development and is almost ready-to-go.
______________________________________________________

A great offer for self-confident players, almost limitless possibilities for customizing the look of their combat vehicles, be the first to enter the battle and leave opponents far behind with a Universal Soldier Founder's Pack
788230.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
